page.title: 19LOXTON - WEBBINGTON AREA
page.content: THE M5 TRAVELLER HAS LITTLE CHANCE TO REALISE THE FULL POTENTIAL OF THIS AREA.FOR THOSE FORTUNATE ENOUGH TO HAVE THE DESIRE TO EXPLORE,JUNCTION 22 OFF THE M5 OFFERS A GOOD ACCESS POINT. ACCOMMODATION CAN BE FOUND IN NEARBY TOWNS OR IN THE DELIGHTS OF THE INFREQUENT INN OR FARMHOUSE.HERE THE VISITOR CAN SAMPLE HOMELY FOOD AND A GOOD BED WITH PLEASING CONVERSATION. EXPLORING ON FOOT OR ON HORSEBACK IS THE BEST WAY TO SEE THE VIEWS FROM MENDIP.MANY FARMS IN THE AREA CATER FOR THOSE WHO CAN RIDE. FOR THOSE WHO PREFER LAZIER DAYS,FISHING CAN BE FOUND OR SIMPLY BIRD WATCHING OR LOOKING AT THE NATURAL LIFE OF THE AREA.
